com.googlecode.aluminumproject.libraries.actions
Interface Action

All Known Subinterfaces:
ContainerAction<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractAction, AbstractContainerAction
public interface Action

The base building block of a template.

          Executes this action.

getParent

Action getParent()
Returns the parent of this action.

Returns:
this action's parent or null if this action does not have a parent

Sets the action that contains this action.

Parameters:

setBody

Parameters:

execute

void execute(Context context,
             Writer writer)
             throws ActionException,
                    ContextException,
                    WriterException
Executes this action.

Parameters:
context - the context to execute in
writer - the writer to use
Throws:
ActionException - when the action can't be executed
ContextException - when something goes wrong while using the context
WriterException - when something goes wrong while using the writer
